title: Here Comes With Power the Lord God
itunes:title: Here Comes With Power the Lord God
description: The God who comes to save us is one who rules with a strong arm, who brings a reward and recompense, who gathers and feeds his sheep, who clears a highway before him. All of these rich metaphors and images are from the prophet Isaiah, the greatest of the Old Testament Advent figures.
content:encoded: The God who comes to save us is one who rules with a strong arm, who brings a reward and recompense, who gathers and feeds his sheep, who clears a highway before him. All of these rich metaphors and images are from the prophet Isaiah, the greatest of the Old Testament Advent figures.

All of these rich metaphors and images are from the prophet Isaiah, the greatest of the Old Testament Advent figures.
itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
